metadata.title: CVE-2024-11233 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In PHP versions 8.1.* before 8.1.31, 8.2.* before 8.2.26, 8.3.* before8.3.14, due to an error inÂ convert.quoted-printable-decode filter certaindata can lead to buffer overread by one byte, which can in certaincircumstances lead to crashes or disclose content of other memory areas.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-11233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php8.3 - 8.3.6-0ubuntu0.24.04.3
libphp8.3-embed - 8.3.6-0ubuntu0.24.04.3
php8.3 - 8.3.6-0ubuntu0.24.04.3

criterions.comment: php8.3 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.3.6-0ubuntu0.24.04.3').
